@0 00100000000111010000000000000001 //addi $11101, $0, 1 
@1 00000011101000001110110011000000 //sll $11101, $11101, 19
@2 10001111101010000000000000000000 //lw $01000=M[$11101+0]
@3 10001111101010010000000000000100 //lw $01001=M[$11101+4]
@4 00000001000010010100000000100000 //add  $01000=$01000+$01001
@5 10101111101010000000000000000000 //sw M[$11101+0]=$01000
@20000 00000001
@20001 00000002
